list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update v_2.3.0 Added: - Circuit Breaker - CustomerDetails request - eureka client to ms_accounts application.properties - eureka client to ms_cards application.properties - eureka client to ms_loans application.properties - models to ms_accounts - Interfaces CardsFeignClient and LoansFeignClient - Annotation @EnableFeignClient to main classes - dependencies to pom.xml: * spring-cloud-starter-netflix-eureka-client * spring-cloud-starter-openfeign
Done: -microservices: * accounts * cards * loans * configServer
Fixed: Connexion: -Docker - ms_acc => configServer - ms_cards => configServer - ms_loans => configServer - docker-compose.yml {DEFAULT, DEV,PROD} ==> configServer

task.summary:
Update 2.2.1 Added: - EurekaServer Application Microservice - Connexion config between configserver => eurekaserver => ms_accounts
Done: -microservices: * accounts * cards * loans * configServer
Fixed: Connexion: -Docker - ms_acc => configServer - ms_cards => configServer - ms_loans => configServer - docker-compose.yml {DEFAULT, DEV,PROD} ==> configServer
